item.title: 3 years on, here's what to keep an eye on in the Ukraine war — and efforts to end it
item.description: Thousands of civilians have been killed since Russia launched its full-scale invasion on Feb. 24, 2022. Amid a stark shift in U.S. policy, Ukrainians want the war to end — but not on Russia's terms.

item.title: A French surgeon is on trial accused of raping or abusing 299 people, mostly children
item.description: The trial comes as French activists are pushing to lift taboos that surround sexual abuse. The most prominent case was that of Gisèle Pélicot, who was raped by her now ex-husband and dozens of others.
